00023 #ifndef _CTK_ERROR_UNIX_H
00024 #define _CTK_ERROR_UNIX_H
00025 
00031 #include <errno.h>
00032 #include "ctk_common.h"
00033 
00037 static inline int ctk_error_translate_unix(int unix_error)
00038 {
00039     if (unix_error == 0)
00040         return CTK_SUCCESS;
00041     if (unix_error < 0)
00042         unix_error = -unix_error;
00043     if (is_ctk_error(unix_error))
00044         return unix_error;
00045     switch (unix_error) {
00046         case EPERM:
00047             return CTK_ERROR_INTERNAL;
00048         case ENOENT:
00049         case EBADF:
00050             return CTK_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND;
00051         case EISDIR:
00052             return CTK_ERROR_NOT_REGULAR_FILE;
00053         case ENODEV:
00054         case ENXIO:
00055             return CTK_ERROR_NOT_FOUND;
00056         case ESRCH:
00057         case ECHILD:
00058             return CTK_ERROR_THREAD_NOT_FOUND;
00059         case EINTR:
00060         case EAGAIN:
00061             return CTK_ERROR_RETRY;
00062         case ENOEXEC:
00063             return CTK_ERROR_NOT_EXECUTABLE;
00064         case ENOMEM:
00065             return CTK_ERROR_NO_MEMORY;
00066         case EBUSY:
00067             return CTK_ERROR_BUSY;
00068         case ENOSYS:
00069             return CTK_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00070         case EFAULT:
00071             return CTK_ERROR_BAD_ADDRESS;
00072         case ENFILE:
00073         case EMFILE:
00074         case ENOSPC:
00075         case EMLINK:
00076             return CTK_ERROR_NO_RESOURCE;
00077         case ERANGE:
00078             return CTK_ERROR_OUT_OF_RANGE;
00079         case EINVAL:
00080             return CTK_ERROR_BAD_ARGUMENT;
00081     }
00082     return CTK_ERROR_UNKNOWN;
00083 }
00084 
00085 #endif /* _CTK_ERROR_UNIX_H */
